title: Foxworth Friday: Atlanta's Parade, narrative around OBJ, Jokic Brothers
description:
Bomani Jones and Domonique Foxworth discuss Atlanta's parade for their World Series champions and what Foxworth learned about the city (and Magic City) from his time spent there (2:30). Plus, the narrative around receiver Odell Beckham Jr.’s departure from Cleveland (22:54) and why the Jokic brothers are not to be messed with (30:23).
